title: 11/25/21 DPS Hour 2
itunes:title: 11/25/21 DPS Hour 2
description:
Doug Gottlieb and TJ Houshmandzadeh guest hosting for Dan on a special Thanksgiving show. Doug and TJ break down the three Thanksgiving day NFL games, and get into how the Bears will respond to the rumors of their head coach's pending departure. Doug gets TJ's thoughts on the best coaches he ever played for, and relates it to the Dez Bryant critical comments about his former coach Jason Garrett. Former NFL Tight End George Wrighster joins TJ and Doug to weigh in on some of the major headlines in the NFL going into Thanksgiving weekend. Doug has TJ evaluate the recent list of Hall of Fame semi-finalists and give his opinion on who is a Hall of Famer or not.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
